ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Very Bad News Regarding Chains
ygData.msgSnippet: At least they came out and said it and we can stop dwelling on it, all give them the finger in unison and get on with our days. /sigh /rude /kill some more
ygData.messageBody:
At least they came out and said it and we can stop dwelling on it, all
give them the finger in unison and get on with our days.

/sigh

/rude

/kill some more stuff

Ninev Rudeflute
3850% of first level and taking 10 minutes to solo a Mt Giant Steep.
E'ci

--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:
> Nerf nerf nerf nerf nerf nerf nerf nerf...
>
> As someone posted below on the thread
> (http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/007394.html)
>
> Pretty sad that it takes basically a couple of months before they
> will come
> out and say "Sorry we nerfed it".
>
>
> Slyde
